businessProfile.name: Lenzini's Pizza
businessProfile.address: 3500 Overland Ave #120, Los Angeles, CA 90034, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 3500 Overland Ave #120, Los Angeles, CA 90034, USA

reviews.text: A small and quaint Pizza place at the corner of Palms and Overland Avenue. A great discovery. The pizzas were delicious!  Like the fact that it is opened very late. This place is very busy with deliveries and pick up. This place is conveniently located.

I work at a daycare up the street and basically we use this place for every bday party! Their service is great they usually have amazing deals and the kids love them like no other!
Used them today for my own kids bday party and again another hit :) thank you!

I am so glad to have some of the greatest Pizza 40 yards for my front door! Great Greek salad and Tiramisu as well. The pictures from my bedroom window. Lenzini's is in the far right corner obscured by the house actually. Nice little dining room (with wallpaper of Venice Italy) and a couple of outside tables. Better dining area than my place.
Delivery-Great pizza! Amazing quality and impressed.

We have been here a few times, each time ordered a ricotta meatball pizza and have always received a pizza with ricotta and meatballs. Tonight we went in and placed the same order. The lady working the register misheard and we received their ricotta speciality pizza, no meatballs. Unfortunately we didn't check the $40 pizza until we got home. I called immediately about the mistake, requested to return the incorrect pizza for the correct one and were told they wouldn't make the correct pizza, just meatballs for us to put on. She also raised her voice when I repeated that we ordered ricotta meatball pizza and she insisted that we didn't. This is just extremely awful customer service. Lost a loyal customer.

editorial_summary.overview: Sauce & dough are housemade daily at this casual pizzeria also offering salads, subs & wings.

Lenzini's is in the far right corner obscured by the house actually. Nice little dining room (with wallpaper of Venice Italy) and a couple of outside tables. Better dining area than my place.

detailedReviews.text: Decent pizza that is on the cheaper side. Wings are surprisingly good. Crisp exterior and good seasoning.

detailedReviews.text: We used a coupon we got in the mail and were extremely pleased with the two topping medium pizza and mozzarella sticks!

detailedReviews.author: Maria
detailedReviews.text: Yummy! The bread is very fluffy. I devoured it as soon as I could.

detailedReviews.author: YM 23az
detailedReviews.text: A small and quaint Pizza place at the corner of Palms and Overland Avenue. A great discovery. The pizzas were delicious!  Like the fact that it is opened very late. This place is very busy with deliveries and pick up. This place is conveniently located.

detailedReviews.text: Good solid pizza.

detailedReviews.author: ted dudek
detailedReviews.text: Best buffalo wings ive had in Los Angeles.  Like they do them back east.

detailedReviews.author: Aimee Holt
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza and great service!  Also, their delivery is super fast when you order on their wesbite.

detailedReviews.author: Melissa Hernandez
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza, always friendly staff!

detailedReviews.author: Michelle Crawford
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza It is not Domino's or Pizza Hut.!

detailedReviews.author: Cheryl Ann
detailedReviews.text: We have been here a few times, each time ordered a ricotta meatball pizza and have always received a pizza with ricotta and meatballs. Tonight we went in and placed the same order. The lady working the register misheard and we received their ricotta speciality pizza, no meatballs. Unfortunately we didn't check the $40 pizza until we got home. I called immediately about the mistake, requested to return the incorrect pizza for the correct one and were told they wouldn't make the correct pizza, just meatballs for us to put on. She also raised her voice when I repeated that we ordered ricotta meatball pizza and she insisted that we didn't. This is just extremely awful customer service. Lost a loyal customer.

detailedReviews.author: Andy Swartz
detailedReviews.text: This is our go to gluten free pizza place in LA currently. Crust is done real nice and always tastes great.

detailedReviews.author: Anna Lownes
detailedReviews.text: Was in search of a vegan AND gluten free pizza and found it here! They kindly checked for me that the gluten free crust was also vegan. Also love that you can get it in a smaller personal size. I‚Äôll be back when another pizza craving hits!

detailedReviews.author: Aram Homampour
detailedReviews.text: THIS IS PIZZA!!!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Taylor Berkowitz
detailedReviews.text:
Ordered delivery. Pizza was insanely soggy‚Äî nearly falling apart because it was so drenched and sopping wet. Mouthfeel: spongy and squelching. There‚Äôs no real taste to anything except overwhelming salt and oil.

Wait, actually‚Äî the flavor of the teeny tiny little Mac and cheese bites *did* bear an uncanny resemblance to the inside of Lenzini‚Äôs freezer. Just straight up freezer-flavored.  That was an interesting touch.

Thank you Lenzini but I will absolutely not be ordering again. Xo

detailedReviews.author: Jake Vines
detailedReviews.text: My favorite place for pizza, try the Alfredo sauce on the pizza it will make any toppings on your pizza that much better too it mixes very well , ciao - Jake

detailedReviews.author: Eduardo Juarez
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely best vegan pizza in town

detailedReviews.author: Jalena Aphay
detailedReviews.text: My favorite pizza spot in the neighborhood!

detailedReviews.author: Maria Ramirez
detailedReviews.text: There are a lot of options and the taste is always reliable. Service is fast. There are 15 minute parking spaces in the Plaza, so ordering for pickup is usually not too stressful.

detailedReviews.author: Rachel Little
detailedReviews.text: Lenzini‚Äôs is our family‚Äôs #1 pizza place around! They are friendly, pizza is consistently delicious & they are always punctual with their timing! Thank you Lenzini‚Äôs!

detailedReviews.author: Kirk Owens
detailedReviews.text: Best affordable pizza in LA

detailedReviews.author: Andrea Sheldon
detailedReviews.text: On time delivery, great pizza, and friendly service. Thank you for being flexible when we mistyped the address!!! Amazing meat lovers.

detailedReviews.author: Sean S
detailedReviews.text: Was craving pizza on my lunch break and not many places are both open and affordable at 10pm, but Lenzini's was both so I figured I'd try it and I'm so glad I did. The pepperoni was great and had that super nostalgic pepperoni taste, the Hawaiian was wonderful, the crust was amazing, and overall it was a perfectly balanced slice. At less than $10 for an individual pizza it's a great deal, too! I'm excited to come back here next time I'm in the area and hungry.

detailedReviews.author: Sebasti√°n L√≥pez
detailedReviews.text: Traditional italoamerican pizza

detailedReviews.author: Tracy
detailedReviews.text:
UPDATE:LENZINIS has been redeemed!...enjoying once again...so delicious
have been ordering here for years as it is the best pizza I've ever had and has always been consistent, I've always given 5 stars on Postmates...however, the last few times, the pizza has come overly oily, and tonight the pizza came so oily and soggy all the toppings were falling off, not to mention the pizza was cut weirdly uneven like it was severely rushed or someone didnt even try....what's going on Lenzinis??...hopefully this is just a hiccup...I will be so sad to not have my Lenzinis anymoreüò´

detailedReviews.author: Evelyn Viana
detailedReviews.text: Delicious üòã

detailedReviews.author: Nicholas Ventura
detailedReviews.text: Good meat lovers pizza. Wasn‚Äôt too greasy or flimsy.

detailedReviews.author: CHOC STAR
detailedReviews.text:
I always come here but I haven't came here in a year or two I ordered but my order was wrong I didn't know until I drove away far parked to eat I called back and a lady said bring the order back she will make a new one but I already drove waisting my gas so i wanted a refund but she tried to force the new pizza she made but I didn't  want it waisting time so I didn't get a refund or a pizza so I was left with nothing people reading this what should I do I need help they robbed me
H

detailedReviews.author: Miguel Moscoso
detailedReviews.text: Great service and the pizza slices came out fast and were delicious!! Friendly service. Perfect amount of cheese.

detailedReviews.author: Julie & Michael Aspeslet-Pozar
detailedReviews.text: Better than Grimaldis in Brooklyn.   Real ingredients worth every penny.

detailedReviews.author: irma delfin
detailedReviews.text: Love the delivery service,üòÄ

detailedReviews.author: Garbanzo Steve
detailedReviews.text: Awesome classic pizza, wings  are great, ranch is homemade and great too

detailedReviews.author: Allen Wu
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza shop. Love the signature favorite üòç

detailedReviews.author: Jocelyn Eke
detailedReviews.text: The pizza, salads, drinks are all good. The tiramisu is delightful. They arrived 20 minutes early to deliver my food. If they quote you a time, they honor in the restaurant b and delivery. Peaceful restaurant dining

detailedReviews.author: Tony
detailedReviews.text:
Disappointed.. Probably just ordered the wrong thing.. The Ceasar dressing is some vegetarian imitation and the personal sized pizzas are probably heated up frozen pizzas..

Guy running/owning the place was nice though. I recommend using a different Ceasar dressing or list it as a vegetarian version (no anchovy) and I'm not sure what was up with that pie, but everything was off. Tasted barely thawed out.. warm, but seemed like it was never "hot" and idk it was just off.. :/

P. S. This is just a temporary review for feedback.. I appreciate that you participate in the food program..

Response to Lenzini's response:

The Ceasar dressing was a packet with non-homemade ingredients and I'm 90% sure the pizza I hade was a commercially made prefab..

If you didn't send me such an off & canned response I would have just deleted this review.. But instead I'm down grading to even lower just based on this terrible attempt at hood-winking the public..

detailedReviews.author: Mary Beth Bray
detailedReviews.text: The thin crust pizza is awesome! We all love it, including our kids. The service is always prompt and friendly. Overall, a great neighborhood spot.

detailedReviews.author: Yulia Shaul
detailedReviews.text: Pizza arrived burned and  completely cold.It‚Äôs looked like it wasn‚Äôt fresh made pizza. When I call them to complain about the order woman( I guess manager of this place)was rude  she didn‚Äôt apologize and just told me: ‚Äúmama, I don‚Äôt cere that you not happy with your order,this is your problem,you can do whatever you want, bye!‚Äù  If you want to eat fresh pizza definitely not from this place.

detailedReviews.author: A Selivra
detailedReviews.text: Some of the best Pizza in LA. Prices are super reasonable. Hope they open up more locations!

detailedReviews.author: Abigail Hall
detailedReviews.text:
Love this place. My roommate and I have been coming here since it opened.

They have an amazing deal on their carry out large 1 topping pizza. Their specialty pizzas are also really good, my roommate and I both love the buffalo chicken pizza. Definitely recommend trying.

detailedReviews.author: DenaBoy DaleMario
detailedReviews.text: I had this today.... and my friends...... its fire. get here asap........

detailedReviews.author: Ann
detailedReviews.text: Very good service, delicious food!

detailedReviews.author: Anna Reyes
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is always superb! Toppings are generous and cooked to perfection. Crust and sauce is super delicious and for leftovers, the pizza tastes great toasted or just eaten straight from the fridge. Also super fast delivery!! Highly recommend!!

detailedReviews.author: Michaela Gray
detailedReviews.text: Lenzini‚Äôs is always the best! We usually get the cheese bread, buffalo chicken pizza, and garden salad and it‚Äôs always so good, so well prepared, and ready to go when we get there. The staff is always so kind and welcoming too! This is a great spot for pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Gloria Ysaguirre
detailedReviews.text: Great place to eat for lunch.  They have parking and a lunch special - small 2 topping pizza and soda for $11.99.

detailedReviews.author: Shaun Cromwell
detailedReviews.text: Best inexpensive pizza in town. If you‚Äôre thinking of ordering from any of the big-name pizza joints, just order Lenzini‚Äôs instead.

detailedReviews.author: Jasmin Zorrilla
detailedReviews.text: I love a cheese pie from this place!! I live out of state, I do not visit Los Angeles and not have a Lenzini‚Äôs pie at least once.

detailedReviews.author: genette716
detailedReviews.text: Delicious food and customer service!

detailedReviews.author: Derek Frankel
detailedReviews.text: Amazing

detailedReviews.author: Colin Jaehnke
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôve been coming here for years, the quality is always great. And the staff are super friendly!

detailedReviews.author: jimmy raymundo
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is  always on point and the service is great, highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: saad sweilem
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in LA.

detailedReviews.author: Kamikg
detailedReviews.text: My favorite pizza place, everything is fresh and very delicious, I tried all the pizzas all of them tasted amazing!!!! The owner is so professional & friendly!!! it's 100000000 out of 10

detailedReviews.author: Aaron Pellow
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Los Angeles!

detailedReviews.author: Leisa Mccord
detailedReviews.text: Excellent place, fast service, good prices. The best place for a proposal!

detailedReviews.author: Ef ‚ÄúF‚Äù Martnez
detailedReviews.text: Great people and food

detailedReviews.author: Jay Cheng
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza, really clean kitchen and dining area. Highly recommended!

detailedReviews.author: George Beattie
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza and amazing people. Only pizza place I will buy pizza from in West LA. Their Gyro pizza is an all time favorite food. Everything about their pizza from quality of ingredients to their crust is delicious. Truly a 10/10.

detailedReviews.author: Rebecca Molayem
detailedReviews.text:
Culver City doesn't have many pizza joints that I truly enjoy. Lenzini's never disappoint. Pizza delicious. The toppings , delicious. The crusts, delicious. The cherry on top, the FREAKIN GARLIC SAUCE. Don't forget to ask for some one the side.

Don't forget to ask them to make your pizza well done.

detailedReviews.author: Anna Loony
detailedReviews.text: The pizza from this place is a staple in my household. The crust on the pizza here is always cooked to perfection. We love it. The sauce on the pizza here is so good that I could eat it with a spoon. The staff is always so friendly and welcoming. It makes the experience even better.

detailedReviews.author: Markie b
detailedReviews.text: My mother & I stop to get a pizza üçï it was good. Will come back near da future

detailedReviews.author: S F
detailedReviews.text: Clean friendly place. Great pizza. Great price.

detailedReviews.author: Alvina Waseem
detailedReviews.text:
Pizza was decent. I appreciate that they let our group come in close to close. I got the cheese slice with mushroom topping. Price was okay, maybe a little expensive for just a slice.

4.5/5

detailedReviews.author: Chelsey Urich
detailedReviews.text: This is my favorite pizza spot in Culver City. The pizza is fantastic, the staff are incredibly kind and their delivery is very quick.

detailedReviews.author: M L
detailedReviews.text: Personally I did not like it. No public restroom; lady refused to let a toddler use restroom.  I understand health code, but declined a child. Smh

detailedReviews.author: Omni Exchange
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely delicious!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.5/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the quick preparation of food without compromising quality. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant is a favorite for hosting birthday parties and offers amazing deals that delight both kids and adults. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The pizzas are consistently described as delicious, with fresh ingredients and unique flavors that evoke nostalgia. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Negative customer service experiences and incorrect orders - review management can address this concern
Consistent issues with food quality (burnt, soggy, or incorrect orders) - review management can address this concern
Poor response to customer complaints - review management can address this concern

She also raised her voice when I repeated that we ordered ricotta meatball pizza and she insisted that we didn't. This is just extremely awful customer service. Lost a loyal customer.
